subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. is no longer considering a fourth division for its smallest members. A committee last fall proposed the creation of a new division or a subdivision of the current Division III because of an expected increase in membership over the next decade. But almost 82 percent of the active and provisional Division III members who responded to a recent survey opposed the idea, the N.C.A.A. said Thursday.
